data.title: Started writing blogs
data.desc: Wrote the first article on Medium as an attempt to learn about SEO techniques. Continued writing here after the two articles were successfully ranked in top results for the relevant keywords.

data.title: Joined Codebrahma as a Software Development Engineer
data.desc: Currently developing Web and Mobile applications with the team at Codebrahma. Loves working on Web but also likes the tiny buttons on mobile apps.

data.title: Graduated with a Bachelor's in Computer Science
data.desc: Secured a worthless degree that everyone does before realising that they wasted four years in college.

data.title: Started freelancing
data.desc: Started freelancing as a full stack web developer and exploring the internet.

data.title: Co-founded Codex
data.desc: Co-founded the college's first coding club, named it Codex, and brought really good folks together to build a strong and ever growing community of coders.
